transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Use kar rahe hai sir mera. Kitne time se use kar rahe hai ye?
Customer: Sir ye mujhe lag raha hai aapko kafi time se use kar rahe hai sir ye.
Executive: Aap complaint bhi lagatar. Kaise chala gaya?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Aise kaise chala gaya sir inke paas?
Executive: Sir pehle se login raha hoga ya to fir inke paas access raha hoga. Ye pehle aapko aap aap aap IndiaMART se log out kar dijiye all devices se. Thik hai?
Customer: Login karke waha se. Haan.
Executive: To ye hua kaise sir inka matlab abhi yahi dekh rahe hai kya Mohit?
Customer: Aapki services to yahi dekh rahe the Mohit ji.
Executive: Yahi use kar rahe the proper pura. Baat kya thi unse abhi?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Main de dunga main de dunga. To kya bol rahe hai?
Executive: Hello. Inhone call kiya tha ki inse meri baat hui thi to ye keh rahe the call ki. Call maine kiya tha subah aake kyuki inhone complaint kiya hua tha ki leads vagaira nahi aa rahi mujhe. Samne se calls vagaira nahi aa rahi hai. Thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan to ek ek inse matlab ye kafi time se use kar rahe hai ek dedh mahina pehle inse meri baat hui thi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi sir maine meri baat hui thi calls ke liye to sir kal aapse ki calls nahi aa rahi. Aap se baat hui thi lekin koi Mohit ji bhi hai inse bhi baat hui thi.
Customer: Nahi nahi Mohit ji to koi nahi hai kya naam isme na sir. Koi bhi lead to inhone liya nahi hai matlab koi lead aa hi nahi rahi to 15 October ko last lead hui hai.
Executive: Achha lead to wo hoti hai na sir generate agar use karte to aise login hoga wo fir. Ye Mohit koi nahi hai fir?
Customer: Mohit to koi nahi hai hamare se koi kar raha ho. Isko main hata bhi deta hu agar. Mere isme bhi nahi dikhata Mohit ka naam se koi hai to. Isko aap log out kar dijiye thik hai all devices se. Log out karke fir se login kar dijiye. Thik hai?
Executive: Baki jo aapka ye concern hai na sir main ispe dekh raha hu main isko catalog vagaira sir photos vagaira wo kijiye sir photos vagaira main fir se kar dunga aapke aap thoda kar dijiye. Matlab kafi time se koi use kar raha hai sir aapki services ko.
Customer: Nahi nahi use karta na sir to lead me nazar na lead ka to dikhta na.
Executive: Haan haan. Nahi Mohit ji aise. Bhupender ji Bhupender ji aapke bhai hai na?
Customer: Koi bhi nahi aa raha.
Executive: Bhupender ji aapke bade bhai hai na?
Customer: Main to Bhupender ji bol raha hu.
Executive: Achha hello. Bhupender ji baat kar raha hu sir. Achha Bhupender ji baat kar rahe hai sorry sorry. Aapke Rakesh ji kaun hai sir Rakesh?
Customer: Haan yahi wale hai.
Executive: Hello. Yahi Rakesh ji hai jinka mobile number login hai na?
Customer: Achha achha. Abhi baat hui thi meri unse Rakesh ji se. Rakesh to koi nahi hai jiska login ho do hi number login hai isme. Thik hai sir ek kaam karta hu pehle to ye main aapka ye concern close karwata hu jo ye Mohit ji ka hai jo ye complaint kar rahe hai thik hai?
Executive: Fir main ispe work karwata hu leads vagaira ka dekhta hu. Sir Mohit ji ka to complaint ka to kuch nahi hai sir baki Mohit ka to chhod dijiye jo unhone dala hai sahi dala hai. Wo aap resolve karwaiye main log out na kar de raha hu usko. Haan usko aap resolve main isko resolve karwa de raha hu thik hai sir. Aap usko ek baar log out kar dijiye apne end se ki koi misuse na kar paye aapki services ka thik hai. Baki main isko karwa raha hu fir main aapko connect karta hu baki main. Thik hai sir aapka ye concern close karwa de raha hu yaha se. Thik hai sir. Okay. Thik hai sir thank you.
Customer: Ek aapke paas Hello.
Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai. Ek feedback jayega sir aapke paas. Thik hai usko bhi aap dijiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reported unauthorized access to account.

- Customer complained about not receiving leads.

- Customer wants to resolve the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested logging out from all devices.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive offered to assist with catalog photos.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with the customer later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- unauthorized access, leads, log out, resolve
